snippet.title: NSW police get new protective vests
snippet.content: NSW police will be fitted out with new light-armour vests to protect them from bullets and stabbings. The move follows a similar rollout in Western Australia in July when frontline officers received stab-proof vests as part of new safety measures. NSW Police Commissioner Mick Fuller and Police Minister Troy Grant will announce the rollout of the new vests on Thursday. Originally published as
